name: 1630 Revello Drive (Summer's House)
effect: Heroes and Companions at this location may be equipped to carry an extra item. Only one additional item per character can be attached because of this location.

effect: Assign to Sunnydale High School Auditorium. You must have An Innocent Guillotine assigned to one of the characters facing this challenge to complete it. Trait Requirement: Demonology.

name: A Dead Cheerleader Is a Good Cheerleader
effect: If Sentient Cheerleading Trophy is assigned to a character facing this challenge, the controlling player receives 1 extra Destiny Point upon completing it.

name: A Friend In Need
effect: Play this card if you have no Companions or Minions in play. Search your Resource Deck for a Companion or Minion and put it into play.

name: A Quick Jaunt to the Funeral Home
effect: If Ring of Prophecy is assigned to a character facing this challenge, the controlling player receives 1 extra Destiny Point upon completing this challenge. Trait Requirement: Demonology.

name: Aaack! Spiders!
effect: Choose an opponent to discard 1 card from their hand.

name: Abduction
effect: When you defeat this challenge, choose a Companion or Minion your opponent controls, fatigue that character, and move it to this location.

effect: Moving to or from this location fatigues Companions.

effect: Human. Amber Grove gains +1 Charm when located at any school location.

effect: Character gains +2 Charm.
